trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Joppatowne
There were no other sightings in Joppatowne on or around February 24th 2009
divs: sighting detailsi live in joppa md and last night at approx. 9:05-9:15 i saw this huge 'very bright' object gliding through the sky, making no noise, coming out of the southeast and heading north. it was on such an angle that i thought it was going to land\crash a mile from me, although it was very hard to gauge how high it was. i have never seen anything like it. i know the comet was around last night but i've seen comets and shooting stars, and this thing was much too close to the ground to be either. then i read that some military helicopters have 30 million power lights on to search, but it couldn't of been that because it was too large of a light and, again, made no noise. i lost sight of the object behind some pine trees behind my house, and i regret now not getting off my porch to get a better look at where it was headed etc.....i find it very hard to believe that i was the only one to see this. i was expecting it to be on the local news this a.m. but was not. i have emailed the local station, but they'll probably delete and move on. i was out on covered porch smoking a cigar at the time. i noticed it out of the corner of my eye. when i first saw i thought meteor but wow, if it was, it was going to hit soon.
